# Ministry of Agriculture and Irrigation (Puntland)

| native_name_a   =
| logo            = Coat of Arms of Puntland.svg
| formed          =
| jurisdiction    = Government of Puntland
| headquarters    = Garowe, Puntland
| minister1_name  = Mohamed Abdiqadir Salah 'Donyale'
| website         = https://moai.pl.so/
}}
The Ministry of Agriculture and Irrigation  () is the government body in the Puntland Government responsible for agriculture and irrigation. It was one of the first ministries established in 1998 in Garowe, the capital city of Puntland. The current minister is Mohamed Abdiqadir Salah 'Donyale'.
